overview.title: What is Merchant Acquiring?
overview.desc: Merchant acquiring is the service that enables your business to accept card payments (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) from customers and receive funds directly into your settlement account. While it sounds simple, there are many processes.

questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
questions.question1: What are the fees involved when sending and receiving funds?
questions.answer1: Our transparent fee structure includes competitive rates for both sending and receiving funds. Domestic transfers typically have lower fees compared to international transactions. Please contact our team for detailed pricing specific to your business needs.
questions.question2: How quickly can I get my cards or POS system for my team?
questions.answer2: Virtual Cards are instantly created and can be issued immediately to your staff within minutes via your dashboard. Physical cards are delivered within 5-7 business days. POS system will require the same 3 - 5 business days and are subjected to availability. Do note that you may need remote training on the use of the POS hardware and software, that can be arranged as well upon leasing our POS systems.
questions.question3: Can I connect the payment gateway to my website or App?
questions.answer3: Yes, our payment gateway offers seamless integration with most websites and mobile applications. We provide comprehensive API documentation and developer support to ensure smooth integration. Our technical team is available to assist you throughout the setup process.
questions.question4: What happens if I lose or damage the issued cards / POS systems?
questions.answer4: Lost or stolen cards can be immediately frozen through your dashboard to prevent unauthorized use. We'll issue replacement cards within 3-5 business days. For damaged POS systems, we offer repair services or replacements depending on the warranty terms. Contact our support team immediately to report any issues.
questions.question5: How does this help with my yearly accounting / bookkeeping?
questions.answer5: Our platform automatically categorizes and tracks all transactions, making it easy to generate financial reports for accounting purposes. You can export transaction data in various formats compatible with popular accounting software. This streamlined process saves time and reduces errors in your yearly accounting and bookkeeping tasks.
